name: cancel_appointment
description: Cancels a calendar appointment in GoHighLevel when a customer cannot attend. Use this when a customer definitively cannot make their scheduled appointment and doesn't want to reschedule immediately.

appointmentId.description: The appointment ID to cancel (provided in the call metadata)

contactId.description: The GoHighLevel contact ID (provided in the call metadata)

reason.description: Optional reason for cancellation provided by the customer (e.g., 'scheduling conflict', 'no longer interested', 'will call back later')
